item.title: 1232 - Check If It Is a Straight Line
item.description: leetcode Problem You are given an array coordinates, coordinates[i] = [x, y], where [x, y] represents the coordinate of a point. Check if these points make a straight line in the XY plane. Solution Important Notice the divider. It may be zero, when the lines are horizontal. class Solution: def checkStraightLine(self, coordinates: List[List[int]]) -> bool: p1 = coordinates[0] p2 = coordinates[1] slope = self.slope(p1, p2) for i in range(2, len(coordinates)): if self.
